name: ccpm
description: Enterprise-grade Project Management plugin for Claude Code. v1.0: Lean, optimized natural workflow commands (/ccpm:plan, /ccpm:work, /ccpm:sync, /ccpm:commit, /ccpm:verify, /ccpm:done) + Linear subagent for 50-60% token reduction. Features: 11 core PM commands, smart agent auto-invocation, TDD enforcement, quality gates, Linear-first tracking with extensible PM tool integration (Jira, Confluence via MCP), monorepo support, safety-first design with tool-agnostic architecture.
